mapper.select: SELECT user_sex AS user_sex, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_info GROUP BY user_sex
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM user_info
SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(*) AS completed_count FROM course_progress cp JOIN user_info u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.is_completed = 1 GROUP BY u.user_name
SELECT user_local AS userLocal, COUNT(*) AS user_num FROM user_info GROUP BY user_local
SELECT user_age AS userAge, COUNT(*) AS age_count FROM user_info GROUP BY user_age
SELECT curpg.*, ui.user_name FROM course_progress AS curpg INNER JOIN user_info AS ui ON curpg.user_id = ui.user_id

SELECT DATE(curpg.created_time) AS click_date, cur.course_name, COUNT(DISTINCT curpg.user_id) AS course_num FROM course_progress AS curpg INNER JOIN course AS cur ON curpg.course_id = cur.course_id GROUP BY DATE(curpg.created_time), cur.course_name ORDER BY click_date, cur.course_name;

SELECT * FROM user_info AS ui
AND ui.user_sex = #{userSex}
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND ui.user_underview = 1

SELECT * FROM user_info AS ui
AND ui.user_sex = #{userSex}
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND ui.user_underview = 0

SELECT uf.followee_id AS user_id, ui.user_name, ui.user_profile_picture, ui.user_bio, uf.created_time AS follow_time FROM user_follow uf JOIN user_info ui ON uf.followee_id = ui.user_id WHERE uf.follower_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_time DESC

SELECT uf.follower_id AS user_id, ui.user_name, ui.user_profile_picture, ui.user_bio, uf.created_time AS follow_time FROM user_follow uf JOIN user_info ui ON uf.follower_id = ui.user_id WHERE uf.followee_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_time DESC

SELECT ui.user_id AS userId, ui.user_name AS userName, usc.score AS score FROM user_info ui JOIN user_community_score usc ON ui.user_id = usc.user_id WHERE usc.community_id = #{communityId} ORDER BY usc.score DESC, ui.user_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_follow (follower_id, followee_id, created_time) VALUES (#{userId},#{followeeUserId},NOW())
mapper.select: select cr.course_id, cr.course_name, cr.course_img_url, cr.course_description, crv.updated_time FROM course AS cr INNER JOIN course_view AS crv ON cr.course_id = crv.course_id WHERE crv.user_id = #{userId}

select post.post_id,post.post_title,post.post_content,post.community_id,post_view.updated_time FROM post INNER JOIN post_view ON post.post_id = post_view.post_id WHERE post_view.user_id = #{userId} AND post.deleted = 0
